page.title: 20TRADE
page.content: The village is served by several mobile shops which include a Baker, a Fishmonger, a Butcher, a soft drinks deilvery, a Coal delivery, a Hairdressers and 2 Paper rounds, one from the Newsagent and one run from a private house. {Milk}is delivered to houses every other day from a business run from a private house. There are two milk vans which deliver to the main village and one hand trolley which is used for houses close to the business. The is a {Garden Centre}which sells flowers, plants, shrubs, seeds and fruit and vegetables in season in addition to gardening tools. A {Steam Cleaner}firm cleans any machinery including cars. A { {Woodcarver}has recently opened from a private house where objects are made to order and close by is a{Hairdresser
